GDGExtended.content: In GDD Extended, GDG Indore provided an opportunity for Indore developers to learn all the technologies discussed in GDD India summit held at Bengaluru. It was like a mini version of GDD where speakers shared their experiences and briefed about firebase and android. https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1BSFb_uCpXGCdtjPCB32ZQ18RLqQ5RP4c
GDGExtended.title: GDG Extended

GDGFebruaryMeetup:CSSSpecial.content: In GDG February Meetup, GDG Indore delivered sessions on UX/UI. It had two long sessions on UX & its Designs, how to deliver a great UX, UI and CSS pursuit along with hands-on session. https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1yBxdAzbrRiym_uJKC6Ts9a3os7Cy3W60?usp=sharing
GDGFebruaryMeetup:CSSSpecial.title: GDG February Meetup: CSS Special

IWDMeetup.content: On International Women's Day, GDG Indore hosted an IWD Meetup to celebrate and support women in technology and also organized inspirational keynotes and talks delivered by women leaders along with hands-on sessions. https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1tkuk1hMKeC6C0muWiq6BjPcA7CKX2MvY?usp=sharing
IWDMeetup.title: IWD Meetup

IOExtended2018Indore.content: I/O Extended event was focused on a hands-on session with Flutter in which we discussed how to make your Android & iOS native apps expressive with the enhanced interface. All the attendees were divided into teams of 3-4 members were made to work on a Flutter project. https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1NS8glmgHlXTShJOtHZO4GNsQVOYdCGS2?usp=sharing
IOExtended2018Indore.title: I/O Extended 2018 Indore

GoogleNext18ExtendedIndore.content: In Google Next’18 Extended we discussed cloud technologies along with hands-on session. We delivered sessions on Kubernetes & Internet of Things (IoT) and also arranged some live examples to get a better understanding of IoT. https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/12jGOPOyEIo7MAQpmBp25HuaeM9tToKsI?usp=sharing
GoogleNext18ExtendedIndore.title: Google Next’18 Extended Indore

GDGAugustMeetup:GitHub.content: In GDG August Meetup, we discussed the world’s leading software development platform i.e. GitHub. We did installation and setup of Git along with a revision of git and advanced git commands. We also introduced Markdown, Jekyll to build a website using it and deploy it to GitHub Pages. https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1B6xG8Jg78mOozWv-ELvDTqwHt-cDLFtL?usp=sharing
GDGAugustMeetup:GitHub.title: GDG August Meetup: GitHub

Varun Kothari.bio: Born with the spirit to uplift the tech world, Varun believes in gratifying challenges and bring dreams to work. He loves to play with myriad of technologies and programming languages. He is one of the top versatile full-stack developer and has developed a wide range of websites using Ruby on Rails and blockchain. He has significantly contributed and got recognition for design, development and deployment of world-class web applications. From completing end to end management of new websites development projects to managing teams, He has done it all. Currently this dynamic personality is working as senior Ruby on Rails and blockchain developer in Throughout Technologies Pvt. Ltd. Having a long time experience in microservices, He has enabled the continuous deployment of large and complex applications, we are delighted to invite him for enriching our top notch crowd with indispensable knowledge and experience through a hands on session in microservices
Varun Kothari.name: Varun Kothari
Varun Kothari.shortBio: Dynamic and versatile full stack developer with proficiency in blockchain
Varun Kothari.title: Senior Developer

Ishwar Sawale.bio: An expert brain is here to enrich you with his hands on session on Machine Learning, AI and Deep Learning. He is a machine learning researcher, data scientist and software developer with an experience of 3+ years and an expertise in Chat Bot development, DevOps and Computer Vision. He has worked on numerous face recognition projects and has also launched an open source face recognition library based on Facenet. So you thought only humans have brains? Come and change your outlook on what machines has for you!!
Ishwar Sawale.name: Ishwar Sawale
Ishwar Sawale.title: Data Scientist

Ankush Tiwari.bio: As the CTO of Mobiliya Technologies, Pune, his key focus areas are leading the IT Strategy, managing global alliances , overseeing annual financial and regulatory planning, and managing multiple engineering teams worldwide. He is also a Machine Learning, AI and Deep Learning expert. His session will enlighten the audience with Machine Learning and Deep Learning concepts.
Ankush Tiwari.name: Ankush Tiwari
Ankush Tiwari.shortBio: Chief Technical Officer at Mobiliya Technologies, Pune
Ankush Tiwari.title: Machine Learning Expert

badges.description: Data Engineering & Machine Learning Instructor Google Cloud Platform
badges.name: Data Engineering & Machine Learning Instructor Google Cloud Platform

Ajinkya Kolhe.bio: Avid reader since childhood. Now diving in depth of Machine Learning. He thinks technology should be fun. He has a passion for technology and loves learning and educating others about latest technologies by engaging himself in public speaking.
Ajinkya Kolhe.name: Ajinkya Kolhe
Ajinkya Kolhe.shortBio: Data Engineering & Machine Learning Instructor. Avid reader since childhood. Now diving in depth of Machine Learning.
Ajinkya Kolhe.title: Data Engineering & Machine Learning Instructor

Pawan Kumar.bio: Pawan is a Google Developer Expert for flutter and active to help different android communities on StackOverflow and Youtube. He is currently working in Flick2Know Technologies Pvt. Ltd., Gurgaon as senior software engineer. He is an enthusiastic developer and an entrepreneur having facination to work for technology and design areas. He is full of energy for flutter and Dart technology. He has worked on many projects in flutter like app for collection of UI in UIKit, WhatsApp Clone, First Open Source Flutter based material design music player, app with firebase libraries. So, energise yourself to have a informative session with him.
Pawan Kumar.name: Pawan Kumar
Pawan Kumar.shortBio: Pawan is a Google Developer Expert for flutter and active to help different android communities on StackOverflow and Youtube.He is currently working in Flick2Know Technologies Pvt. Ltd., Gurgaon as senior software engineer.
Pawan Kumar.title: Google Developer Expert

Tarulata Champawat.bio: She is Global Manager(Technical Solutions and PreSales) of Infobeans Technologies Limited, Indore. She is in the software game for over 17 years and having expertise in ServiceNow and its integration with Google Alexa, Splunk, Jira and Slack. She is having the curiosity and passion to deliver Wow experience to clients. She likes to think herself as the teller of the stories behind the Technologies they works on, the solutions they create and and the experience they deliver.
Tarulata Champawat.name: Tarulata Champawat
Tarulata Champawat.shortBio: Global Manager - (Technical Solutions and PreSales) at Infobeans Technologies Limited
Tarulata Champawat.title: ServiceNow Expert

Nikita_Gandhi.bio: Born with the spirit of an entrepreneur, Nikita loves to create, build and just do fun stuff in the technology field. She enjoys delivering talks and conducting workshops for Python, Mobile and Web technologies. Her primary expertise is Flutter and Python, but she is also friendly to backend technologies. She loves being a part of something that delivers a change. Currently, She is an organiser of Women Techmakers Pune. She is an active community contributor and likes to write blogs in her free time.
Nikita_Gandhi.name: Nikita Gandhi
Nikita_Gandhi.shortBio: Born with the spirit of an entrepreneur, Nikita loves to create, build and make positive impact in the community.
Nikita_Gandhi.title: Flutter Evangelist & Developer

Harshada Kshirsagar.bio: The star advisor at Microsoft, Harshada believes in supporting and helping people through her contributions to technology. She has worked with ISVs and partners in the EDU sector to bring their applications and services on Windows 10 and the Microsoft Store. She loves mentoring students and professionals through lightning talks and workshops with her primary expertise being Cross platform app development with Xamarin and MSIX. Her community contributions has won her the most prestigious award by Microsoft Developer Evangelist team for supporting and encouraging startups and techies globally.
Harshada Kshirsagar.name: Harshada Kshirsagar
Harshada Kshirsagar.title: Windows Dev Consult Engineer at Microsoft

Dr. Satish Patil.bio: A scientist by training and an entrepreneur by nature, Satish founded Crysagi Systems and is currently building it. Satish realized that the machine learning research was full of business opportunities. He set out to build a new approach of knowledge transfer where we can help companies find business opportunities that exist at the intersection of their existing data and machine learning research.
Dr. Satish Patil.name: Dr. Satish Patil
Dr. Satish Patil.shortBio: Founder and Chief Data Scientist at Crysagi Systems Pvt Ltd
Dr. Satish Patil.title: Data Scientist

Mayank Mishra.bio: Lightning Talk  Migrating Big Data solutions to Google Cloud Platform - considerations, architecture and recommendations
Mayank Mishra.name: Mayank Mishra
Mayank Mishra.shortBio: Lightning Talk  Migrating Big Data solutions to Google Cloud Platform - considerations, architecture and recommendations
Mayank Mishra.title: Innovation Lead, Big Data Solutions

tickets.info: Valid for Female developers only. To promote more Female in tech we are giving access to female developers separately. Any male registered for this ticket will be disqualified automatically at the event.
tickets.name: Women Techmakers

tickets.info: This ticket is valid for students and professional developers who are enthusiastic about learning new technologies. Make sure you have prior programming experience as topics of sessions will be advanced, taking the audience into consideration.
tickets.name: Early Bird

tickets.info: This ticket is valid only for non-student working professionals who are part of any organisation. It will be compulsory to show your professional ID (company identification) at the event entrance.
tickets.name: Professional Developer

tickets.info: This ticket is valid for students as well as working professionals. Make sure you have prior programming experience as topics of sessions will be advanced taking the audience in consideration.
tickets.name: Regular Bird

tickets.info: These tickets are for students as well as working professionals. People who couldn’t grab the DevFest tickets before, this is the last opportunity for them to be a part of the event.
tickets.name: Lazy Bird
